scripts.build-dev: npm install; mkdir ./build; mkdir ./build/webapp; npm run build --prefix backend; cp ./backend/build/main.js ./build; cp ./backend/.sequelizerc ./build; npm run build --prefix frontend; cp ./frontend/build/main.js ./build/webapp
scripts.build-prod: mkdir ./build; mkdir ./build/webapp; npm run build --prefix backend; cp ./backend/build/main.js ./build; cp ./backend/.sequelizerc ./build; rm -rf backend; rpm run build --prefix frontend; cp -r ./frontend/build/. ./build/webapp; rm -rf frontend
